text: Rock-a-Doodle is a 1991 Irish/British/American live-action/animated musical comedy adventure movie. It was produced by Sullivan Bluth Studios and Goldcrest Films. It is loosely based on Edmond Rostand's comedy Chantecler. Rock-a-Doodle was directed by Don Bluth and written by David N. Weiss. The movie has the voices of Glen Campbell, Christopher Plummer, Phil Harris (in his last movie role before his retirement and death), Charles Nelson Reilly, Sorrell Booke, Sandy Duncan, Eddie Deezen, Ellen Greene, and Toby Scott Ganger in his movie debut. The movie was released in the United Kingdom on 2 August 1991 and in the United States and Canada on 3 April 1992. == References == == Other websites == * * * * Category:1991 adventure movies Category:1991 comedy movies Category:1991 fantasy movies Category:1991 animated movies Category:1991 musical movies Category:1990s fantasy-comedy movies Category:American adventure movies Category:American animated movies Category:American musical fantasy movies Category:American musical comedy movies Category:American fantasy-comedy movies Category:British adventure movies Category:British animated movies Category:British musical movies Category:British fantasy movies Category:British comedy movies Category:Irish adventure movies Category:Irish musical movies Category:Irish fantasy movies Category:Irish comedy movies Category:Movies directed by Don Bluth
title: Rock-a-Doodle
